keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: In the deal, Moody’s admitted that it did not follow its own standards in rating risky mortgage investments before the 2008 recession.
snippet: In the deal, Moody’s admitted that it did not follow its own standards in rating risky mortgage investments before the 2008 recession....

headline.main: Moody’s to Pay $864 Million to Settle Inquiry Into Inflated Ratings
headline.print_headline: Moody’s to Pay $864 Million in Inflated Ratings Case
